mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, GENDER, IS_ACTIVE, IS_ADMIN) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{gender}, #{isActive}, #{isAdmin})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ZIPCODE = #{zipCode}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE USERS SET USERNAME = #{username}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, GENDER = #{gender}, ZIPCODE = #{zipCode}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive}, IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT PASSWORD FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT U.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT * FROM USERS ORDER BY USER_ID DESC ) U WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RN >= #{startRow}
